name: V-ART "you can walk only here
description:
Is it artwork or a game? At least, you need to put this one into your oculus.

The goal of this artwork is to find the use of traditional art in the digital world. Our future is linked to unstopable grown of technology. Technique in work combines traditional craft graphics with VR. The person who wears the Oculus becomes a performer and part of the art. This participant is the protagonist of the artwork, walking through a virtual world filled with linocut prints made outside of the digital realm. Theresult of work offers an opportunity to investigate the use of art in the virtual world.

Techniques: Linocut print, 3D, VR

Programmer: Tomáš Vician: https://viciantomas.itch.io/

Art, Sound: Radka Matuseková
